_header: The red rose and the white
_description: On the Union of the Lancastrians and Yorkists, A.D. 1486 — one couplet

OxfStJohn57.Transcription:
The Red Rosse & þe wythebe knyght to geder with grett
                    delythe
OxfStJohn57.Note:
Added to flyleaf by hand of late fifteenth to sixteenth century, with
                    drawing of a rose.
